# Analysis of Hypotheses:

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false


options(digits = 3)

suppressMessages({
source("R/DataPrep.R")
source("R/read_hyp.R")
source("R/eval_hyp.R")
source("R/adj_nested_pvals_AEH.R")
})

# hypotheses <- hypotheses[9:10, ]
# unlink("cache", recursive=TRUE)
AEH <- list()
for(H_ID in rownames(hypotheses)) {
  if (interactive()) message(H_ID)
  AEH[[H_ID]] <- eval_hyp(hyp <- hypotheses[H_ID,], D)
}
AEH <- adj_nested_pvals_AEH(AEH)

saveRDS(AEH, "cache/AEH.rds")
```


```{r print_hypotheses}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| results: 'asis'
for(AEH_i in AEH) {
  print(AEH_i)
}
```
